channel.title: Please help me asap
channel.description: Ok to get people interested and actualy read this the first person to help me gets mod&member rights on my server. There thats finished ok so I just finshed with my server still adding a few codes but was gonna release to public so i got my no-ip and port fowarded it and everything but i tried to run it and it dont work and idk y its got a ip and its been port forwarded with net gear and everything is up and running i just cant get on when i use ip if i delte ip and just have server running i can get on and do stuff but no one else can what do i need to do and dont say do you have the newest java i have heard it so many times of course i have the newest java i need real ideas thanx if u have msn im on there and is a faster way to contact me add me its deshawn82@hotmail.com thank you in advance for anyones help[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 01, 2008, 11:16:56 pm[/size][hr]come on need help now tyring to host tonight

item.title: Please help me asap
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“deshawn82, post:3, topic:223465”]yeah that makes a lil sense but i honestly dont know what a local host is[/quote]localhost = 127.0.0.1. its a loopback ip that all computers have.

item.title: Please help me asap
item.dc:creator: @RSC_n33b RSC_n33b
item.description:
@RSC_n33b wrote:

you cannot log on with your own ip address but other people can.
other people will be able to log in using your ip , but you will have to use localhost
does that help lol?

Read full topic
